title: Project Collaboration Software Features - OpenProject
content: Powerful project collaboration features Project management features support project teams throughout the entire project life cycle. Project Portfolio Project Portfolio Project Planning Project Planning Task management Task management Agile, Kanban & Scrum Agile, Kanban & Scrum Time tracking Time tracking Team collaboration Team collaboration Product roadmap Product roadmap Workflows Workflows More benefits More benefits Security Security Project Portfolio Project Portfolio Project Planning Project Planning Task management Task management Agile, Kanban & Scrum Agile, Kanban & Scrum Time tracking Time tracking Team collaboration Team collaboration Product roadmap Product roadmap Workflows Workflows More benefits More benefits Security Security Project Portfolio Management Stay on top of all your projects Have an overview of your entire project portfolio - whether for classic, agile or hybrid project management. Working on several projects, OpenProject allows you to create a project structure with hierarchies and marking projects as favorites. Keep an eye on the status of your projects with the project list or your individual project dashboard. Project portfolio Have your overview of your projects at any time with the personalized project lists, favorite projects or your custom project dashboard. Make project lists public or mark as favorites. Learn more Share project lists ﻿ Create a persisted project portfolio by filtering your project lists, including by your own project attributes. Share your personal project lists with other users and groups. Learn more Project hierarchy Use a project hierarchy to structure your projects using parent projects and sub-projects. Learn more Project overview page Customize this dashboard with project attributes, widgets, and graphs to suit your needs. Choose from a variety of OpenProject widgets to visualize your project's status and progress. Learn more Project life cycle ﻿ Monitor project life cycle and track progress of your project portfolio. Coordinate your project portfolio with custom project phases and phase gates. Learn more Project templates Create project templates in OpenProject to set up everything that you want to have available for future projects. It will save you time. Learn more Project dashboard The My page module is your personal dashboard that displays information about all your projects. Customize it to your needs. Learn more Project changes The project activity tracking displays changes in a project. From changes to a work package to project attributes, incl. project custom fields. Learn more Multi-project views Create custom filters across all of your projects to never lose track of important tasks. Share task views to give the team the same view. Learn more Project Planning & Scheduling Deliver your projects on time Activate the experience of your entire team to collaboratively create and visualize your project plan. Define your project objectives and break it down into smaller deliverables. Analyze required activities and create a detailed plan that shows how and when the project will provide the deliverables defined in the project scope. Plan your team member's priorities and workload in the team planner. Gantt charts Create a project management plan that visualizes how and when the work packages and milestones will be delivered. Generate a timeline collaboratively with the team. Learn more Work packages Work packages are items in your Gantt chart (e.g. phases, milestones, tasks, features, bugs etc.) with specific attributes, assigned to team members. Learn more Relations and hierarchies You can assign relations on functional or timely levels (e.g. successor or predecessor, blocked by, part of, etc.) as well as hierarchies (parent-child relationship). Learn more Scheduling Choose between automatic or manual scheduling mode to schedule your work packages. Learn more Work week Define working days and non-working days to schedule start and finish date of work packages during working hours. Learn more Baseline comparison ﻿ Display changes to work packages tables and get a quick overview of what has changed over time, making it easy to report on project progress and status. Learn more Calendar The calendar displays work packages in calendar form. Keep an eye on all deadlines and subscribe via iCalendar format. Learn more Date alerts ﻿ Date alerts allow you to receive a notification when a start or finish date of a work package is approaching. Learn more Team planner ﻿ Get an overview of which team member is working on what and when tasks are due and schedule work accordingly. Learn more Task management and issue tracking Transparent responsibilities and tracking of progress OpenProject is the easiest way for teams to track their work and achieve results. Organize and prioritize your own tasks and assign tasks to team members. Have all tasks and communication in one place. Everyone is up to date about the progress and next steps.
